user.title: Configure Tududi Panel
user.description: Enter your Tududi server details to create a sidebar panel and sensors in Home Assistant.

data_description.url: The full URL to your Tududi server (e.g., http://192.168.1.100:3000)
data_description.title: The title that will appear in the Home Assistant sidebar
data_description.icon: Material Design Icon name (e.g., mdi:clipboard-text, mdi:format-list-checks)
data_description.username: Your Tududi username/email (optional, required for todo sensors)
data_description.password: Your Tududi password (optional, required for todo sensors)

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the Tududi server. Please check the URL and try again.
error.invalid_url: The URL format is invalid. Please enter a valid URL (e.g., http://192.168.1.100:3000)
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

abort.already_configured: This Tududi URL is already configured. Each URL can only be configured once.
